channel.title: Brands & Suppliers on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Brands & Suppliers on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Add edit brand
item.description: In this page brand can be added or existing edited. Brands9 Fields below are presented: Name This field is mandatory, when trying to ssave it without entering the name, it will show the following message: “please fill out this field.”. Below a helpt text is presented: “Invalid characters:<>;=#{}”. When trying to save with invalid characters entered, will show the following error: " “invalid characters that were input” is invalid. Short description This is a text input block, here it’s possible select in which language the text will be written, all the imported languages to the shop will be shown.

item.title: Add/edit new brand address
item.description: In this field brand address can be added or edited. AddressesIn this section there ar 13 input fields for the brand address to be entered or edited. Brand This is a drop-down field of the current brands in the shop that can be selected. Last name This is a mandatory input field, when trying to ssave it without entering the last name, it will show the following message: “please fill out this field.

item.title: Brand view
item.description: In this page the information about the brand and it’s products is displayed. AddressesIn this section there 8 columns are displayed: Name Address Address (2) City State Home phone Mobile phone Other Call to action Edit, when pressed redirects to the add/edit brand address ProductsEvery product name is a link as well, when pressed the Product page is opened. Below all the products under the brand are listed, the following product information is provided:

item.title: Brands
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - CATALOG - BRANDS & SUPPLIERS - BRANDS Grid BrandsManufacturerGridDefinitionFactory.php Default action in the button: View Other available actions in the menu: Edit, Delete Row action: View Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column and to columns with enable/disable actions. Grid AdressesManufacturerAddressGridDefinitionFactory.php Default action in the button: Edit Other available actions in the menu: Delete Row action: Edit Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column.

item.title: Brands and suppliers brands
item.description: In this page Brands and suppliers are displayed. Call to action2 call to actions are displayed in the header of this page: Add new brand ðŸ‘‰ See the specs of the add/edit brand Add new brand address ðŸ‘‰ See the specs of the add/edit brand address Settings wheelWhen clicking on the settings wheel, the following options are displayed: Import After clicking on it, the Import page is opened. Refresh list After clicking on it, the page is reloaded.

item.title: Supliers Tab
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - CATALOG > BRANDS & SUPPLIERS > SUPPLIERS TAB GridSupplierGridDefinitionFactory.php Default action in the button: View Other available actions in the menu: Edit, Delete Row action: View Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column and to columns with enable/disable actions.
